verses.name: Job 3:1
verses.text: After this opened Job his mouth, and cursed his day.

verses.name: Job 3:3
verses.text: Let the day perish wherein I was born, and the night in which it was said, There is a man child conceived.

verses.name: Job 3:4
verses.text: Let that day be darkness; let not God regard it from above, neither let the light shine upon it.

verses.name: Job 3:5
verses.text: Let darkness and the shadow of death stain it; let a cloud dwell upon it; let the blackness of the day terrify it.
